[!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#19)] 這個程式碼範例可以只在 Windows Forms 應用程式內執行。This code example can run only within a Windows Forms application. 檔案名稱應該參考您的系統上的.wav 音效檔。The file name should reference a .wav sound file on your system. 若要簡化管理您的音效檔，請考慮將檔案儲存為應用程式資源。To simplify the management of your sound files, consider storing the files as application resources. 這些檔案然後可以透過存取`My.Resources`物件。These files can then be accessed through the `My.Resources` object.
